purpose: To provide a standardized interface for AI agents to interact with various external services and APIs
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture with plugins to integrate different services via a single SDK
reusability: Highly composable with support for plugins and extensions, offering a unified API for various service integrations
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited service integrations and stability issues
name: sdk
description: Smithery helps AI agents access external services via a unified gateway.
highlight: Unified gateway for AI agents to access external services seamlessly
